reviewText: As I had hoped. Funny and goofy gift for a relative. You will laugh at this show for sure. Thanks.
arrived quickly, within a week of ordering, dvd set was brand new and in packaging, as was stated it would be.
I have enjoyed this dvd very much.  It has some extemely funny story lines and I plan on buying the previous seasons also.
We love the life and times of Tim... It's a shame that they canceled it. The package came in two days, right in time for Christmas
I bought this for my brother in law for christmas and I have only been able to see a few episodes but they were still just as funny as all of the other episodes I've seen.
This show is so great. It's understated and hilarious. It has never got the recognition it deserves. I'm glad it's on Amazon video so we can keep watching and loving it.
Oh my hell. I've been wanting all three seasons of this forever. This show is definitely not for everyone, but all of my friends and I love it. We love the type of humor it provides.
I just purchased this book and I love it. Very funny and creative.  I read it to my son nightly. Amazing book.
Awesome
Totally under rated, one of my favorite shows of all time,
Best show ever. Hope they make more.
I can't believe they cancelled this show. So great!
Why HBO?!?  Why do you not keep shows like this going instead of short runs?  This one, Mr. Show, Ricky Gervais Show, just to name a few.  Get back to what made you great.
Season 3 of one of the funniest shows to ever be on television
Hilarious and way underrated. Watch it now! one episode and your hooked.
Funniest show ever. Be great if Netflix gave it a second life
the best !!!!
New item
As funny as the previous seasons.

i own all 3 seasons of tim.  it is humor that is based on day to day life.  the characters are likable, no crazy gross humor of throwing up or stuff about bathroom stuff.

the dialogue is well written.  fun cameos by random comedians and actors/actresses.

Since HBO GO removed this show from it's line up I went and ordered all three seasons. This show was/is great and I was sad to see it end at Season 3. If your a fan you may as well order the series cause i'm sure they aren't producing any more dvds and just like the Chris Rock show... it's not on HBOGO

The social dynamics of The Life & Times of Tim were consistently unwavering: just not in Tim's favor. The poor guy sees it all through and generally has a good outlook on life although the odds don't ever seen to be in his favor. Great voice acting, writing and animation. Thanks to all who made this show happen, I really enjoyed it!
I love this show keep it going ... It's hilarious!! I can watch it over and over again and I still will laugh the same.
Love this series and it is evident that this season had a larger production budget by the guest voices that appear throughout. What a shame that this is that last season of the series.

My boyfriend and I quote this show ALL the time! It even has a lot of great cameos from some seriously funny and famous people. If you are looking to laugh at Tim and all the bad things that happen to him, please get this. Also, the theme song will become a part of you. :)
Funny, quirky, and crude. An extremely funny comedy show that doesn't make you want to stop watching. Also was shipped quickly and made it all in one piece! lol
Just watch. Good stuff. Anal is not the way. Pitcher or catcher, it's no good. Supersonic quadroparalitic erectile dysfunction lovely
awesome dvd funny great quality overall Im very please with this purchase, thank you so much and more likely I will be making more purchases from this site
The show itself is very funny but the only problem i have is there really wasn't any good bonus stuff but i can't really complain cause the show is what you buy the dvd's for.

I enough watching Tim. It's a funny how he gets himself into the awkward  situations.
Tim is either a show you like or don't like.

This show is soooo underrated!  If you love Seinfeld and Arrested Development-type humor, you will love "Tim."  Although the last season I felt ran out of steam in a few episodes, it is still pretty funny overall.  Definitely check out this show if you like to laugh!
I'm a big fan of this show.  You can tell they're all sitting in a room together as they record this, cracking eachother up.
Created a review before received it. I thought I was posting about the one I had got previously. I just ordered and I received a email it will arrive Saturday. Which is fast.
I love this show.  Steve and Nick Kroll never fail to deliver the funniest animated show on HBO.  I purchased the non-HD format since it is a cartoon and it looked great on a 1080 TV.
My nephew loves this HBO cartoon animation, got him all three season of "the life & times of tim"  for a christmas gift.  I have to admit I like it too.
Funny enough that my sides hurt.. Any bad day at work  can be remedied with an episode of Tim.
Great shopping experience. Smart, Sophisticated, Modern look. Great gift, I love it so much. Thanks for the Careful Consideration of seller
Hilarious and underrated show. Video quality seemed a bit compressed on dvd though.
first and second season in my opinion were way better but this has its moments as well and being the last season might as well nab it!
just hilarious. I really miss this show

Quite simply the funniest show ever made.  If I was stranded on an island with only one option for what to watch for the rest of my life, it would be this.

It's the 3d Doritos of television: gone long before its time and missed by everyone.
The adult humor in this series is like no other!!
I'm very partial to the show I've always loved it. I am surprised it only lasted three seasons. My favorite episode is game night. It's the biggest laugh you'll ever get
Hilarious I love this show wish they had a season 4!
One of the funniest animated shows ever.
